name: MO-BO
description: You have accidentally hit the emergency defense system button and must escape with your life! Solve puzzles to make a clear path for MO-BO (mobile robot) to get to the computer and shut down the system.  WASD to move, space to jump. This game was not tested for MAC so if you have a MAC it might not work.  Press tab for exit button and make sure to check the ends of each stage. This is because the resolution was not ouputted correctly.
